thread.title: Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call
thread.title_full: Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call

author: USATODAY
title: Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call
text:
Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call Calm down, Tom. Post to Facebook Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call Calm down, Tom.  //usat.ly/2jKEPQU   Tom Brady freaks out after not getting call Steven Ruiz , USATODAY 10:56 p.m. ET Jan. 14, 2017 4 Shares 
Tom Brady didn't get a roughing passer call. He was not happy that he did not get that call and let the referees know that with a pretty intense freak out. 
Brady initially seems to be taking his aggression out on Jadeveon Clowney who continued to tackle Brady after he had let the ball go. It was at the point that Brady probably realized Clowney is 6-foot-6, 267 pounds and decided that go after the old dudes in stripes was a safer option. 
You have to wonder if another quarterback - say Cam Newton - had reacted similarly, would a flag have been thrown? What do you think? Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2jKEPQU Most Popular
